intro: Hippocentaurea centaurium, commonly known as the Centaury, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. The plant typically grows in rocky or gravelly soils and is adapted to dry, sunny environments. Its leaves are usually narrow and grass-like, while its flowers are clustered in racemes. Hippocentaurea centaurium is often used in herbal medicine for its purported healing properties.
